name: Ad Infinitum (Martech)
overview: A sidescrolling shooter which is very much a clone of Uridium. It was developed by Darrin Stubbington and Tim Rogers and published by Martech in 1986. This game was also released as WAR (in the same year, and also by Martech) and in Italy as Infinitum in multiple publications including Mega Games n.5 (gennaio 1988), Byte Games n.12 (settembre 1987 and in Hit Games n.4 (febbraio 1987).
